Pre-Game Insights: Senegal, the 2021 AFCON champions, find themselves in an unexpectedly challenging position after a surprising 1-1 draw at home to Burkina Faso.
The Teranga Lions will be desperate to bounce back when they face Burundi, who currently top Group L after an impressive 3-2 away win against Malawi.
Burundi, currently leading Group L, will be no pushovers, having shown resilience in their opening win.
